channel.title: Pest Control doesnt start
channel.description:
I recently noticed that when in the pest control boat, no interface comes up saying how many players are needed, but i know from a past experience that you need 3 players to start. So i multilogged 3 players and went in the boat and waited like 5 minutes and nothing happened...
Here is my whole pestcontrol.java..
http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=2PdQ4D6U
